en.道内の新型コロナウイルス感染症（COVID-19）に関する最新情報を提供するサイ: This site provides regularly updated information about COVID-19 in Hokkaido.
en.北海道による公式情報と客観的な数値をわかりやすく伝えることで、北海道にお住まいの: Its goal is to provide easy-to-understand, unbiased information on the spread of infection in Hokkaido, in order to keep residents, companies, and visitors informed about the current situation regarding the virus.
en.開発・運営は、エンジニアやデザイナーなどによって結成された「JUST 道 IT」: Development and operations are carried out by "JUST DOU IT", a group of engineers and designers formed for this purpose.
